code: import React,{useState}from'react';import PokemonForm from'../components/pokemon-form';import Pokemon from'../models/pokemon';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PokemonAdd=()=>{const[id]=useState(new Date().getTime());const[pokemon]=useState(new Pokemon(id));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"header center",children:"Ajouter un pok\xE9mon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PokemonForm,{pokemon:pokemon,isEditForm:false})]});};export default PokemonAdd;
